import React, {useState} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import {addItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import { toggleCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import Video from '../video/video.component' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import SizeChart from '../size-chart/size-chart.component' import './collection-details.styles.scss' const CollectionDetails = ({items, addItem, dispatch}) => { return (
{items.map(item => ( <>
{item.videoUrl &&
{item.type} ${item.price}

{item.name}

{ dispatch(toggleCartHidden()) addItem(item)}}>Add to Bag Favourite

{item.description}

  • Colour Shown: {item.colour}
))} {!hidden &&
}
) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CollectionDetails)
